function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited information quantifying consumption variations by sector","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis of energy consumption patterns, leading to ineffective mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Conduct detailed studies to quantify consumption variations by sector and at the individual household level","Technologies":"Data analytics and machine learning for detailed consumption analysis","People":"Energy consumers, policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Increased use of electricity in the residential sector shifts additional energy costs to households","Impact":"Financial burden on low-income households","Mitigation":"Implement energy efficiency measures and financial aid for low-income households","Technologies":"Energy-efficient appliances, solar panels, financial assistance programs","People":"Low-income households, policy makers","Owner":"Utility companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of measured data from individual households to understand the direct impact on energy use behavior","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess the impact of energy use behavior changes","Mitigation":"Collect and analyze measured data from individual households to understand energy use behavior","Technologies":"Smart meters, energy monitoring systems","People":"Researchers, energy consumers","Owner":"Research institutions, utility companies"}]}
